22  """This module represents Vietnamese language. 
23   
24  For more information, see U{http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vietnamese_language} 
25  """ 
26   
27  from translate.lang import common 
28  from translate.lang import fr 
29   

30 -class vi(common.Common): 

31      """This class represents Vietnamese.""" 
32   
33      # Vietnamese uses similar rules for spacing two-part punctuation marks as  
34      # French, but does not use a space before '?'. 
35      puncdict = {} 
36      for c in u":;!#": 
37          puncdict[c] = u" %s" % c 
38   

39 -    def punctranslate(cls, text): 

40          """Implement some extra features for quotation marks. 
41           
42          Known shortcomings: 
43              - % and $ are not touched yet for fear of variables 
44              - Double spaces might be introduced 
45          """ 
46          text = super(cls, cls).punctranslate(text) 
47          return fr.guillemets(text) 

48      punctranslate = classmethod(punctranslate) 

49
